 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/c2a5f8a9e32be2d30f8fb70699f6b72b1085714816.png> 	

We believe that strong, visionary women shape the future of luxury. And we are committed to fostering a workplace where women lead, innovate, and inspire.

This International Women's Day, we celebrate the resilience and leadership of the women who drive our success—at work and in life. A diverse, equitable, and inclusive world thrives when all women and girls have the rights and opportunities they deserve.

Happy International Women's Day!

Tell us: <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=431&user=10620> What’s one change you want for all women and girls?
